data.what_is: MaaxMarket is an artificial intelligence platform designed to help small businesses with marketing. It has all required components to run your small business marketing. It comes with integrated email marketing, social media publishing & listening tools, real time website visitor tracking and collaboration tools. Apart from you getting the benefit of seeing a snapshot of all your marketing activities in one platform, we have an AI engine that will analyze your marketing data and give suggestions on what works in your digital marketing. The AI engine uses Natural Language Processing to understand your marketing request and execute marketing campaigns easily and effectively.
data.product_description: Artificial Intelligence platform to help small business with automating digital marketing. Comes with in-built email marketing, social media marketing, web analytics and collaboration platforms. Pricing starts at just $10 / monthMaaxMarket is the first company to introduce artificial intelligence on top of marketing. Marketing Automation is still a complex industry where small business users are left with complex automation workflows. MaaxMarket removes the complexity from Marketing Automation by introducing ALBY, the artificial intelligence that will configure workflows for your business automatically based on what works in terms of digital marketing.

Comes with in-built email marketing, social media marketing, web analytics and collaboration platforms. Pricing starts at just $10 / monthMaaxMarket is the first company to introduce artificial intelligence on top of marketing. Marketing Automation is still a complex industry where small business users are left with complex automation workflows. MaaxMarket removes the complexity from Marketing Automation by introducing ALBY, the artificial intelligence that will configure workflows for your business automatically based on what works in terms of digital marketing.Seller DetailsSellerMaaxMarketYear Founded2015HQ LocationBoulder, ColoradoTwitter@MaaxMarket2,019 Twitter followersLinkedIn(r) Pagewww.linkedin.com3 employees on LinkedIn(r)MMOverview Provided by:Maax Market Inc,All-in-One Marketing Automation Software

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: Based on 14 MaaxMarket reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: Based on 14 MaaxMarket reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending.

features.name: Manage Email Deliverability
features.content: Based on 14 MaaxMarket reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Ensure inbox delivery. Includes opt-in management, bounce handling, unsubscribe processing, suppression lists, email preview, spam checking, link validation, and delivery monitoring.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Based on 14 MaaxMarket reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: Based on 14 MaaxMarket reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: Based on 12 MaaxMarket reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Test alternate versions of emails, landing pages, and forms. Learn what works, maximize response rates, and increase conversion.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Based on 13 MaaxMarket reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages.

features.name: Search Tracking and Optimization
features.content: Based on 13 MaaxMarket reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Track performance of keywords and links in major search engines.  Measure search rankings and performance.  Improve page-level SEO with tools to diagnose and improve page performance.  Integrate with Google AdWords.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: Based on 12 MaaxMarket reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Based on 10 MaaxMarket reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading
features.content: Automatically qualify and score leads based on demographics as well as prospect online behaviors, including recency and frequency. Assign your own weights to determine lead scores for prioritization.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Based on 10 MaaxMarket reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: Based on 13 MaaxMarket reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks.

features.name: Automated Alerts and Tasks
features.content: Based on 10 MaaxMarket reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create tasks automatically and provide real-time sales alerts over email, RSS or mobile device.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system.

features.name: Program ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: Based on 11 MaaxMarket reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Manage marketing campaigns and programs across multiple channels, including online ads, video campaigns, mobile, virtual events, and social media. Create and optimize program assets such as landing pages, emails, campaigns, and lists. Track program objectives, results, and costs to assess the program ROI.

features.name: Event / Webinar Marketing
features.content: Streamline the entire event process, including personalized invitations, registration, reminders, and post-event follow-up.  Integrate with online meeting tools like WebEx, Adobe Connect, GoToWebinar.

features.name: Calendaring
features.content: Based on 11 MaaxMarket reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Maintain a marketing calendar across multiple groups. Manage the calendar for the entire marketing department, from promotions to content to PR.

features.name: Budgeting
features.content: Manage all aspects of marketing investments, including assigning top-down budgets to various groups and divisions, planning marketing spending across programs, tracking open-to-spend, ensuring budget compliance, coordinating work-flows and permissions, and reconciling plans with actual invoices.

features.name: Social Listening
features.content: Monitor what leads and contacts say on sites such as Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn, blogs, and online communities.  Incorporate into your lead and customer DB and use social insights to segment prospects.  Trigger campaigns, and update lead scores.

features.name: Social Sharing
features.content: Based on 12 MaaxMarket reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Add intelligent social share buttons to your campaigns and content.  Track who is sharing your content and driving conversions.

features.name: Social Campaigns
features.content: Based on 12 MaaxMarket reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Schedule automated posts to one or more social accounts; use or integrate with URL shortening services; and measure likes, comments, replies, and retweets.

features.name: Social Media Engagement
features.content: Based on 10 MaaxMarket reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Social apps including polls, sweepstakes, and referral programs can enhance audience engagement.  Include these on your website, landing pages, Facebook pages, and emails.

features.name: Social Media Advertising
features.content: Amplify brand and community stories; Reach customers by social profile and activity; Optimize social ad campaigns in real-time

features.name: Basic Reporting
features.content: Based on 14 MaaxMarket reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives.

features.name: Web Analytics
features.content: Based on 14 MaaxMarket reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Track which pages prospects and customers visit and how often they come back.  Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors.  Send alerts to sales reps of which of their prospects and customers web activity.

features.name: ROI Analytics
features.content: Measure leads, prospects generated, pipeline, revenue, investment, and ROI by marketing channel or program. The result is that you can see which marketing investments are generating the greatest return and get visibility into how marketing budget should be allocated going forward.

features.name: Revenue Analytics
features.content: Analyze how leads flow through the funnel by measuring stage to stage conversion rates and velocity.  Allocate pipeline and revenue credit among all the marketing activities that have successfully touched an opportunity as it moves through the pipeline.

features.name: SEO / Keyword Analytics
features.content: Based on 12 MaaxMarket reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Monitor and track how you rank for relevant keywords on major search engines and compare your overall performance to competitors.

features.name: Pop-up Chat
features.content: Enables a popup chat window on company websites to encourage interaction between website visitors and designated company representatives.

features.name: Notifications
features.content: Delivers notifications to both sides of the conversation.

features.name: Targeted Emails
features.content: Sends automated emails to further engage clients and potential clients.

features.name: In-App Messaging
features.content: Allows for live chat to be enabled within the app for customer help.

features.name: Co-Browsing
features.content: Allows agents to join a customer's browser session and navigate through the website with them.

features.name: Customization
features.content: Allows users to customize chat colors, text, logos, and branding.

features.name: Conversation Archiving
features.content: Archives conversations in a separate location for later reference.

features.name: Lead Development
features.content: Enables employees to denote potential customers.

features.name: Knowledge Base
features.content: Establishes a knowledge base for employee reference during conversations.

features.name: Team Inbox
features.content: Provides a central location for help requests, helping employees respond sooner.

features.name: Customer Profiles
features.content: Allows for the creation of profiles for contacts and customers.

features.name: ROI Tracking
features.content: Helps marketers measure return on investment (ROI) by analyzing campaign effectiveness against costs

features.name: Data Collection
features.content: Gathers data about the effectiveness, impact, and reach of marketing campaigns

features.name: Customer Insights
features.content: Collects and reports on data relating to customer journeys, preferences, and history

features.name: Multi-User Access
features.content: Allows multiple users access to a unified, transparent overview of analytics, dashboards, and campaign results

features.name: Campaign Insights
features.content: Analyzes historical and current marketing campaigns to inform future strategy

features.name: Reports and Dashboards
features.content: Creates reports and dashboards to analyze results of campaigns

features.name: Campaign Stickiness
features.content: Identifies which marketing campaigns resolved in open or closed opportunities

features.name: Multichannel Tracking
features.content: Collects marketing campaign performance data across multiple channels

features.name: Brand Optimization
features.content: Provides opportunities for brands and businesses to fix or modify existing or future campaigns via feedback

features.name: Predictive Analytics
features.content: Uses artificial intelligence (AI) to predict campaign outcomes and suggest actions for optimization

features.name: SEO Alerting
features.content: Delivers instantaneous notifications to alert users to significant issues or changes that could compromise a website's SEO health.

features.name: SEO Auditing
features.content: Evaluates a website's overall SEO health and recommends actions to correct potential issues or improve content.

features.name: SEO Change Tracking
features.content: Maintains a full record of changes to website content or infrastructure, and provides access to historical snapshots or backups.

features.name: Technical SEO
features.content: Provides an SEO web crawler that consistently monitors and identifies technical issues within a website.

features.name: Link Building
features.content: Provides tools for backlink analysis and identifies relevant link building opportunities.

features.name: Keyword Research
features.content: Suggests related keywords for a given search term and provides metrics such as keyword volume, difficulty, and competition.

features.name: SERP Rank Tracking
features.content: Tracks organic rank for targeted keywords and reports on current and historical metrics for average position, visibility, share of voice, traffic, etc.

features.name: Localization
features.content: Provides keyword ranking data based on geographic location and device type.

features.name: Content Insights
features.content: Offers tools to optimize SEO content such as long-tail keywords, audience insights, content intelligence, or an AI writing assistant.

features.name: Competitor AnalysisView full feature definition
features.content: Provides competitor data on key metrics such as backlinks, SERP rankings, organic search traffic, domain strength. etc.

features.name: Data Visualization
features.content: Displays rankings and key metrics visually, such as through charts or graphs

features.name: Custom Reports
features.content: Enables users to build customized SEO reports

features.name: White Label
features.content: Enables users to add their own branding to SEO reports

initial_reviews.review_title: It has everything you want for your online business.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MaaxMarket?
It has everything you need from automatic scheduling to chat support and visitor tracking. Very easy interface and so many features from running email campaigns to social media posting.

What do you dislike about MaaxMarket?
Nothing as such. I wish to have more features like a landing page and email validator and Instagram posting. It's really a good CRM with Chat support feature which I wish to be more evolved in terms of Whatsapp and Social Media integrations like Drift and Crisp.

Recommendations to others considering MaaxMarket:
It's really worth using and the best replacement for so many tools which you can use for marketing and customer support for all your business.

What problems is MaaxMarket solving and how is that benefiting you?
We've been using Maax Market since past couple of months it help us in reducing our cost on so many other tools and  SaaS products by using this single all-in-one tool.

initial_reviews.review_title: One Stop Shop for Small Business Marketing
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MaaxMarket?
The key benefit of MaaxMarket is that it provides everything a small business needs for online promotion in one easy to use, dashboard based environment.

Combining good quality email marketing with professional social media management has been tried before, but by adding both to a campaign diary and enabling simple but sophisticated automation Maaxmarket gets to the top of the class, at a price SME' can justify. The recent addition of a powerful SEO tool makes MaaxMarket a 'must try' for every ambitious small business owner.

What do you dislike about MaaxMarket?
At the time of writing a number of automation triggers were still in development and these will add significantly to the app's appeal.

Recommendations to others considering MaaxMarket:
Please access a demo before implementation, The software is straightforward but this will save you time.

What problems is MaaxMarket solving and how is that benefiting you?
Small business owners need a simple to use, reasonably priced, tool to enable them to market their businesses online. MaaxMarket fills this gap in the market very well.

What do you like best about MaaxMarket?
The key benefit of MaaxMarket is that it provides everything a small business needs for online promotion in one easy to use, dashboard based environment.

Combining good quality email marketing with professional social media management has been tried before, but by adding both to a campaign diary and enabling simple but sophisticated automation Maaxmarket gets to the top of the class, at a price SME' can justify. The recent addition of a powerful SEO tool makes MaaxMarket a 'must try' for every ambitious small business owner.

What do you dislike about MaaxMarket?
At the time of writing a number of automation triggers were still in development and these will add significantly to the app's appeal.

Recommendations to others considering MaaxMarket:
Please access a demo before implementation, The software is straightforward but this will save you time.

What problems is MaaxMarket solving and how is that benefiting you?
Small business owners need a simple to use, reasonably priced, tool to enable them to market their businesses online. MaaxMarket fills this gap in the market very well.
